title: What are the features of my phone?
answer:
Simple but delicate design 

 76% screen-to-body ratio and silky rear cover 

 8.8 mm thin 

 64-bit octa-core high-speed processor 

 A53 architecture and 28 nm manufacture process 

 13 MP BSI HD rear camera 

 F2.0 wide aperture and 5P lens 

 Burst mode, audio control, audio photos, all-focus mode, and watermarks 

 Honor DNA 

 Ultra long battery life, ultra strong signal reception, and ultra high quality 

 Easy to use 

 Huawei EMUI 3.0 (on Android 4.4) 

 Standard and simple UI switch at the touch of a button   
 Comprehensively improved multi-task processing capabilities
